channel.title: Wave Multiplication
channel.description:
Hi,
Is it possible to do wave multiplication, as per the famous Serge module? I've been trying a couple of things, but haven't struck gold yet, so any advice would be much appreciated!
Thank you in advance!

item.title: Wave Multiplication
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

The Serge wave multiplier sections are based on heavy distortions (VCA / saturation, wavefolder, full wave rectifier) combined with filtering.
https://www.cgs.synth.net/modules/cgs113_vcm.html
If you do not plan to exactly model it, i think it is possible to do similar stuff with the axoloti.

It is a good challenge to implement these on the axoloti with limited aliasing.

Read full topic
